mapper.sql: id, orderId, hsId, name, amount, tsc, tsu
mapper.select:
select
from hs_ying_fee where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hs_ying_fee ( id, orderId, hsId, name, amount, tsc ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into hs_ying_fee
id, orderId, hsId, name, amount, tsc,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update: UPDATE hs_ying_fee SET orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
